table.name: vtiger_modcommentswhatsapp
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_modcommentswhatsapp` ( `modcommentsid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `commentcontent` text, `related_to` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `parent_comments` varchar(100) default NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_modcommentswhatsappcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_modcommentswhatsappcf` ( `modcommentsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`modcommentsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
